summary: This is an email chain from July 2019 between FBI personnel coordinating victim specialist availability for interviews related to the Epstein case in Miami. It discusses scheduled victim interviews and the logistics of providing support services.

persons.name: M.S.C.J.
persons.context: FBI Victim Specialist based at the Miami Headquarters and Homestead Resident Agency, who is coordinating availability to meet with victims after their interviews.

events.title: Scheduled Victim Interviews
events.description: Two victim interviews were scheduled for 11 AM and 3 PM in Miami as part of the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Case Agent Travel to Florida
events.description: An FBI Case Agent was reported to be traveling to Florida to conduct interviews related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively conducting victim interviews in Miami related to the Epstein investigation in July 2019.
Two specific interviews were scheduled for July 11, 2019, at 11 AM and 3 PM.
An FBI Case Agent traveled to Florida on July 10, 2019, to conduct these interviews.
The correspondence shows FBI Victim Specialists were on standby to provide support services to victims following their interviews.
The email chain demonstrates ongoing investigative activity and victim coordination years after Epstein's initial prosecution.
